title: Hacking Stock Markets, Part 2
description: Financial markets make good targets for criminals: after all, that's where the big money is. Surprisingly, many of these criminals are not your run-of-the-mill black hat hacker, but brokers registered with the SEC: Genuine finance industry professionals.
